auto.info:
FARES W.E.F - 08/05/2013

Fare:
Rs 25/- for first fall of 2 Kilometer (upon downing the meter) and thereafter Rs. 8/- per Kilometer for every additional Kilometer.

Night Charges:
25% of the fare (11:00 PM to 5:00 AM)

Waiting Charges:
Rs 30/- per hour or part thereof (Subject to a minimum of 15 minutes stay)

Luggage:
Rs. 7.50/- shall be charged as extra luggage charges whereas the driver/ operator shall not charge and money for a shopping bag or a small suitcase

taxi.info:
Taxi (Black &Yellow Top)
FARES W.E.F - 08/05/2013

Fare:
Rs 25/- for first Kilometer (upon downing the meter) and thereafter Rs. 14.00/- per Kilometer for Non-AC taxis and Rs . 16.00/ per Kilometer for AC taxis for every additional Kilometer

Night Charges:
25% of the fare (11:00 PM to 5:00 AM)ss
Waiting Charges:
Rs 30/- per hour or part thereof (Subject to a minimum of 15 minutes stay)

Luggage:
Rs. 10/- shall be charged as extra luggage charges whereas the driver/ operator shall not charge and money for a shopping bag or a small suitcase.
